ComicInfo.Series: Loaded Bible: Blood of My Blood
ComicInfo.Summary:
This is the first time Jesus has come in from the desert in years. Inside the city, heâ€™s met with hatred while Dracula is greeted as a hero. But none of that matters when, finally, the epic duel between Dracula and Jesus begins!
